author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Judicial Magistrate Suba Anbumani on Tuesday granted custody of Swagat Varma, son of Vasuki and administrator of SVS College of Naturopathy, Kalanidhi, college principal, and Venkatesan, member of a fringe Dalit outfit, to the CB-CID till February 5.

The CB-CID sought eight days to interrogate them. However, the court granted only five days custody.
title: Granted CB-CID custody
